trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Elizabeth
There were no other sightings in Elizabeth on or around October 14th 2003
divs: Sighting Details1 Looking at stars.23 Thought they where two planets close to each other.4Amazed and a little stupid that I didnt look at them better.5 Noticed Lights,thought it a little wierd I had not noticed them before. Turned to watchaircraft flying in to D.I.A.landing pattern. Turned back one planet was gone,the other started to fade, turned to a color like a cigarette cherry and gotsmaller. Then arched about a half inch at arms length and dissapeared. Now, Inoticed about the same type of event a couple days earlier. A little different.Thought you might find that a little interesting also. This is a rural area, thenight sky really sticks out. I see satilites, falling stars and landing lightsall the time. Real familiar stuff to me. These events are way different.
